mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORTNO, R.USERID, R.TARGETID, CASE WHEN R.type = 'user' AND M.USERNAME IS NOT NULL THEN M.USERNAME WHEN R.type = 'user' AND M.USERNAME IS NULL THEN '탈퇴한 사용자' WHEN R.type = 'club' AND C.CLUBTITLE IS NOT NULL THEN C.CLUBTITLE WHEN R.type = 'club' AND C.CLUBTITLE IS NULL THEN '삭제된 모임' ELSE '알 수 없는 사용자' END AS TARGETNAME, R.TYPE, R.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.REGDATE,'yy.mm.dd') as REGDATE, R.RESULT, R.RESULTMESSAGE FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.TYPE = 'user' AND R.TARGETID = M.USERID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON R.TYPE = 'club' AND R.TARGETID = C.CLUBNO WHERE R.USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY REGDATE

SELECT r.reportNo, m.userId AS userId, m.userName AS userName, r.targetId, r.content, r.regDate, r.result, r.resultMessage, r.type, CASE WHEN r.type = '유저' OR r.type = 'user' THEN tm.userName WHEN r.type = '클럽' OR r.type = '모임' THEN tc.clubTitle ELSE 'Unknown' END AS targetName FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN member tm ON (r.type = '유저' OR r.type = 'user') AND r.targetId = tm.userId LEFT JOIN club tc ON (r.type = '클럽' OR r.type = '모임') AND r.targetId = tc.clubNo
